Name: Ripples of Unseen Rivers
Notes: This piece is a synthesis of 'Tides of a current flowing' (guitar) and 'Whispers of heavenly death' (voice), both based on a poem by Walt Whitman.
Long Description: This piece is a synthesis of 'Tides of a current flowing' (guitar) and 'Whispers of heavenly death' (voice), both based on a poem by Walt Whitman. It is composed for countertenor and percussion (1 player) including vibraphone, marimba, and glockenspiel.
Short Description: A synthesis of two pieces based on a poem by Walt Whitman, for countertenor and percussion.
